(Simplified: 霁)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 齊 indicates the sound; 雨 (rain) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 雨 [ yǔ ] rain
    • 齊 [ qí ] even, uniform, of equal length
①雨雪停止，天放晴：雪霽。霽色(像雨後晴空那樣的顏色)。光風霽月。
②怒氣消除：霽顏。霽威。色霽。
霽月清風 [ jì yuè qīng fēng ]: bright moon and fine breeze (idiom)
(Simplified: 霁)

Pictophonetic: 齊 indicates the sound; 雨 (rain) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 霁

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to clear up after rain.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 霽雨 jì yǔ (rain is stop)

霽字的基本解释

霽
jì
见“霁”。

霽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》子計切，去霽，精。］
“霁1”的繁体字。
(1)雨止天晴。
(2)泛指风霜雨雪停止，天气晴好。
(3)明朗，晴朗。
(4)收敛威怒之貌而呈和悦之色。

霽字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　霽； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1379第22
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?子計切，音擠。【說文】雨止也。从雨齊聲。【爾雅·釋天】濟謂之霽。【註】今南陽人呼雨止爲霽。【疏】濟，止也。【書·洪範】曰雨曰霽。【傳】龜兆形有似雨者，有似雨止者。【前漢·魏相傳】爲霽威嚴。【註】霽，止也。　又【集韻】才詣切，音嚌。晴也。【埤雅】雨晴曰霽。　又【集韻】在禮切，音薺。又子禮切，音泲。義?同。

Ji
Basic explanation of words
Ji
jì
See "ji".
Ji
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guang Yun" Zi Ji cut, go to Ji, fine. ]
"霁1" in traditional characters.
(1) The rain stops and the sky is sunny.
(2) Generally refers to the wind, frost, rain and snow stop, and the weather is fine.
(3) Bright and sunny.
(4) Convergence of mighty appearance and presents the color of harmony.
Ji
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Rain Characters】　ji; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1379 Page 22
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? The sound is squeezed. [Said the text] The rain stopped. From the rain in unison. [Erya·Shitian] Ji is said to be Ji. [Note] Nowadays, people in Nanyang call Yuzhi for Ji. [Sparse] Help, stop. [Book·Hong Fan] Yue Yu Yue Ji. [Biography] Turtle signs have those who resemble rain and those who stop like rain. [Previous Han·Wei Legend] Ji Majesty. [Note] Ji, stop also.　[Jiyun] It’s just cut, sound. Sunny too. [Pi Ya] Yu Qing said Ji.　 [Ji Yun] In Liqie, Yin Nian. You Zi Liqie, Yin Yao. Righteous? Same.
